front.head: EPIGRAM ADDRESSED TO THE AUTHOR OF THE NOTE ON THE FOLLOWING LINES OF POPE.

lg.l: WHILE Wisdom shines with light divine,
Good FOSTER's name shall ne'er decline:
Then cease, vain cur, the Moon to bay.
